description: Number of positive squarefree integers less than 10^n.
links: G. P. Michon, On the number of squarefree integers not exceeding N. [From _Gerard P. Michon_, Apr 30 2009]
example: There are 608 squarefree integers smaller than 1000.
crossrefs: Apart from initial term, same as A071172.
Binary counterpart is A143658. [From _Gerard P. Michon_, Apr 30 2009]
author: _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 01 2001
extensions: More terms from _Dean Hickerson_ and _Vladeta Jovovic_, Aug 06, 2001
One more term from _Jud McCranie_, Sep 01 2005
a(0)=0 and a(14)-a(17) from _Gerard P. Michon_, Apr 30 2009
